ValidationRule.description: AB turned off 4/13 - wasn't working had to split into multiple rules.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
AND(OR( Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState = "South Dakota", Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState = "Montana", Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState = "New Hampshire" ), NOT( FS_Fees__c = 0 )),
AND(OR( Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState = "Arkansas", Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState = "Nevada"), FS_Fees__c > 0.20 * Premium__c),
AND(OR( Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState = "Connecticut", Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState = "Maryland"), FS_Fees__c > 500 ),
AND(Opportunity__r.Account.BillingState = "New Jersey", FS_Fees__c > 250 )
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage:
FS Fees must not exceed the following amounts:
• No FS Fee allowed (MT, NH, SD) • FS Fee – 20% of Premium (AR, NV) • FS Fee – $500 (CT, MD) • FS Fee – $250 (NJ)
